name: Calculation Castle: Greco's Ghostly Challenge "Subtraction"
description:
Calculation Castle: Greco's Ghostly Challenge "Subtraction" is a game that lets players enjoy studying while challenging their skills in math. It contains a collection of subtraction problems and math drills learned at the elementary level. There are up to 10 steps of learning, starting with elementary 1st grade level 1-digit math problems to developing skills such as borrowing numbers with 2-digit math problems and more. Advancing through the levels, players can naturally learn to solve 4-digit subtraction problems with ease.

The game is composed of a series of stages and there are ghosts and locked doors within each stage. Greco and his ghosts will present the player with problems that they will need to solve in order.

name: Bleentoro
description: Game about building simple factories.

name: West Gunfighter
description: Explore 3D open world in a Wild West of kill-or-be-killed frontier as a cowboy!

name: Zombie Serial Killer Incident
description: Her small town transformed into a world of terror, crawling with zombies. An unprecedented tale of click-based action and suspense is about to begin.

name: Craft Warriors
description:
A New Generation RTS

A new generation 3D real-time strategy game!

Craft your own original characters, form your party, and battle against by players all over the world!

name: Block'hood VR
description: Block’hood VR is a neighborhood-building simulator that celebrates the diversity and experimentation of cities and the unique ecosystems within them. Budding city planners will have access to 200+ building blocks to create unique neighborhoods and discover the implications of their designs.

name: Show Me What You Got
description: When juggling is all you know, use your skills to work your way to fame and fortune.

name: Void Cube Runner
description: VCR is skill based runner game. Infinity running game meets with music. It's time to show yourself how you are skilled in leaderboard.(READ THE DESCRIPTION PLEASE)

name: The Platformer Gun
description: Use your Platformer gun to create your way to surpass the obstacles and escape big evil dudes in 80+ levels!

name: OS:Path
description:
Small but tricky indie game to spend your evening on playing.
You'll have to determine the cause of a program's critical error and restore its modules by playing mini games and solving puzzles while using the console.

name: Death Game+
description: It's a race to your grave! Can you die before everyone else, or will you be forced to watch in despair, living to a ripe old age before finally succumbing to a regular, uninteresting ending?!!

name: Food From the Sky
description: Food from the sky is a casual platformer in which you play as a parrot. Your task is to eat as much as possible food that falls from the sky, but do not eat bad food, like muhammers or grebe. How much food can you eat?

name: Trivia Vault: Tennis Trivia
description: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Tennis Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer tennis trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.

name: Intelligence
description: Intelligence - a puzzle game in which you want to build the image so that the picture was like the original image. Move the puzzle tiles wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images

name: Eon Fleet
description:
Eon empire is back! And now you have to get in your spaceship and defend your homeplanet against whole Eon Fleet!

Eon Fleet is a simple, yet fun and challenging space shooter with huge amount of enemies from spaceships to asteroids and space mines.

Simple and fun arcade gameplay
Two different modes - campaign and endless mode.
Different powerups and enemies

name: Blind Mind
description: A mental patient and a psychologist

name: Bustories
description: A small visual novel about bus trips and conversation with different companions, whom you see for the first and last time in your life.

name: The Capture Worlds
description: In "The Capture Worlds" you will travel to other worlds to fight monsters which you've never seen before. Capture them, train them and fight back! Become the new ruler of the monsters! Start your new journey now!

name: Doodle Date
description: Romance, seduce, and even marry your own drawings! Forget about finding true love; In Doodle Date, you create it!

name: Brew Town
description: Design your own range of beer and brew your way to success!

name: Royal Adventure
description: Become a Guardian of Midgard - a brave and valiant defender of humanity. Use every movement to wage battles against the horde of monsters and descend into the very heart of the mysterious Dungeon!

name: Soap Dodgem
description:
CLEANING IS THE NEW FUN!
Slide the soap squad and clear your enemies through the mazes of a bathroom!

THERE’S SO MUCH DIRT TO GET RID OF!
Finish the 100 levels of the campaign or play other people’s creations in the cloud!

FEELING CREATIVE?
Create your own levels in the built-in editor and share it with the World or send them directly to friends! Upload them to the Cloud and try to reach the toplists!

name: Jelly Escape
description:
The adventures of the cute jelly left in search of freedom! 
You have to run, run and use the traps and various objects to get into the black hole to take you to the next level.

name: Sdorica
description: An RPG title featuring masterfully crafted audio and visuals along with a massive volume of story to boot. With over 30 characters each with unique skills and abilities, you can mix and match your team of three and strategize your way through waves of battles. Player get to unravel the story as they progress, allowing them to sink into this original experience.

name: The Eerie Inn
description: The Eerie Inn is a mystery, puzzle-solving horror game with a strong emphasis on the narrative. You play as one of the girls staying at a guest house and your mission is to find out the truth behind the mysterious things happening there. You will soon realize that things aren't what they appear to be..

name: Tori
description: Explore spirits of sound by flying as a bird through the mystical floating islands of Otokai.

name: Steampunk Tower 2
description: Steampunk Tower 2 is an action-strategy game set in the alternative Steampunk universe. In Lord Bingham’s military service there is a new secret weapon under your command, the gigantic aircraft Carrier transporting the Battle Tower.

name: Skee-Ball
description: Skee-Ball is officially licensed Skee-Ball arcade game. Skee-Ball is fun and action packed alley bowling game which you can now take with you wherever you go. The game captures all the fun of the original arcade game, features a host of new game variants.

name: Cycle of Eternity: Space Anomaly
description: The story is twisted around three graduates of the space fleet, who fell into a time trap. Trying to get home they get into an even bigger mess. Fight with enemies, improve your ships, go through the story and try to free your heroes from the space trap! Classic turn-based RPG with the unusual story in the space.

name: Toy Generals
description: Toy soldiers! Prepare for battle! The house is full of enemies and we must drive them out! Sniper - get in position! Grenadier - your target is the tower. Infantry - attack! Check every nook and cranny, battle the enemy in the attic, in the garden, up in the treehouse. Build up your unique squad and take back the house!

name: Don't Pray to Satan
description: Don't Pray To Satan is an unforgiving city simulator/strategy game, where you must monitor and protect your city's inhabitants from praying to Satan and bringing about the end of days.

name: Shin Megami Tensei IV & Apocalypse: Double Hero Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Tony Land
description: Super Tony Land is a platformer with a powerful level editor and an emphasis on telling stories and building entire game worlds.

name: Ganbatte
description: Ganbatte

name: Mike was Cursed
description: In a quiet Canadian town with a population of 17 thousand, people start disappearing; especially women and children. A spouse of a disappeared woman discovered what happened, and returns from his business trip. Once he comes back, he realizes that his family was not the only one to disappear.

name: Metal Max Xeno
description:
On that day humans start to face a crisis of destruction...
A new title from the RPG "METAL MAX" about the story of human and tank is here! "METAL MAX Xeno" now here on PlayStation!
Taking place at the ruined metropolis known as "Death Tokio" the story is one that actively involves the protagonist and tanks (vehicles) starting with the R Wolf.
Numerous possibilities for the tank customization awaits, containing features such as weapons, engines and equipment.
So enjoy this reincarnated true post-apocalyptic RPG now!

name: Puppet Fever
description: Puppet Fever is a VR game developed by Coastalbyte Games and published by Coffee Stain Publishing. Players take turns to control the puppet theatre and it's puppets in VR while the others guess the hidden word.

name: Watch Me Jump
description: An entirely different kind of basketball game. A narrative-driven journey told in four quarters.

name: Bedlamball
description: Bedlamball is a goal scoring game where you change the rules as you play!

name: For the King
description: For The King is a turn based roguelike, RPG that can be played solo or cooperatively online and features strategic adventuring, turn based combat, and persistent choices. Players must survive cunning enemies and creatures, wicked weather and brutal traps in their quest to solve the mysterious death of the king and bring order to the land.

name: Swordfish
description: An aquatic action game. Swim sword first into the deep to destroy the evil at the heart of the ocean.

name: Kpop Piano Game: Color Tiles
description: Play Kpop music on the piano and train your reaction. More fun if it is played together with friends.

name: Luminous of Stellar
description: Luminous of Stellar – is a s a top-down shooter sci-fi game with colorful ships and endless levels. Choose your own flight in space with two game modes endless and classic!

name: Disco Road
description: Switch lanes to the beat in Disco Road. Also import your own music too. Run along through dancing worlds, pickup notes and power-up all to your favorite music.

name: Barrage
description: Tired of "Pew-Pew"pistol,Why not try about Bofors 40mm Anti-Aircraft Guns,or Mighty 88mm Flak-cannon?Shatter the sky with your BARRAGE,and ther is nothing like aiming or reloading can distrub you from shooting.

name: Infinity Ops
description:
A multiplayer FPS in a sci-fi and CYBERPUNK setting!
The event of the game take place in the distant future, when humanity has surpassed the limits of technological development and the world has descended into the chaos of interplanetary warfare!

Player will face team PvP combat as classes like Recruit, Saboteur, Tank, and Assault! Each of the classes has its own features and abilities.

name: Doom II + Master Levels
description: The highly anticipated sequel to Doom, this GOG release brings not only Doom II, but also introduces the Master Levels for Doom II. Twenty never-before-seen levels all with the same acid drenched, hell spawned horror of the originals. Each was created by independent designers and supervised by the demented minds of id Software. You might as well forget about seeing the light of day ever again.

name: Enigmata: Stellar War
description: Build a base and protect it against enemies in this exciting tower defense game!

name: Teleportals. I swear it's a nice game.
description: I swear it's a nice puzzle game.

name: Infinity Ops
description:
A multiplayer FPS in a sci-fi and CYBERPUNK setting!
The event of the game take place in the distant future, when humanity has surpassed the limits of technological development and the world has descended into the chaos of interplanetary warfare!
Player will face team PvP combat as classes like Recruit, Saboteur, Tank, and Assault! Each of the classes has its own features and abilities.

name: Jewels Fantasy
description:
Enjoy a wonderful and fantastic trip in the new Jewels Match 3 puzzle game!
Let's go to the world of jewels fantasy anytime, anywhere!

name: BraveWorld: Sky Rolling Ball
description: A finger control the ball to avoid falling into sky!

name: Geeste
description: Take on the role of the ultimate Ghost-Fighting robot "Ghostatron 9000" and eradicate every ghost in site, you are humanity's last hope. Will you be the 1st one to make it to the end, to claim your prize?

name: Dynamite Headdy Classic
description: Head-swapping fan-favorite Dynamite Headdy is now available on mobile!

name: Retro Rocket Robot
description: Retro fly & slide game inspired from the past.

name: Knight Bewitched
description: Follow the tale of Ruth, fearless knight of Halonia, and Gwen, feisty witch of the Underbog. As the two and their companions journey together to save the world, love begins to ignite in Ruth's heart. But is this true love or is Ruth truly bewitched?

name: FlappyU
description:
Want to fly? So high, that you can reach the sky? Give FlappyU a try!
FlappyU is a VR game in which you can fly with your own wings! Flap your arms to avoid the tricky obstacles. Unlock cooler wing models as you improve your high score and compete with other flappers on two global leaderboards!

name: Kama Bullet Heritage 2
description: Help the main character Kame Poole to figure this out. Take on the role of fighter equipment "TAA-SHAA." But note that one wrong blow or step will lead to irreversible death.

name: Planum
description: PLANUM is a 2D platformer in which you will operate an aircraft

name: Russian AYE Horror
description:
Russia, alternative to 2488, became the President Grudenen Tsar Pupin resigned for a long time, Russia was swallowed up in chaos, in search of supplies necessary for survival Sanya came to the village of Kuvandyk, there he went looking for a provincial reservation, but the building turned out to be the home of Valera's grandfather and Sanya inside the building saw strange things - portraits of President Putin, terrible sounds and Sanya decided to quickly find supplies and leave the building.
You play for Sanya, and you need to explore an abandoned building in the village of Kuvandyk to find all the photos. Be careful, beware of THEM.

name: Dark Dimensions: Somber Song - Collector's Edition
description: Townspeople flee as the black smoke covers their town. Can you close the dark dimension, before it’s too late?

name: Abnormal world: Season One
description: In this big abnormal world, there is not enough food. Your task is to feed the inhabitants of this world.

name: Zima uhodi!
description: Play snowballs? In May? Why not!

name: Hatchick
description: The game begins in the middle of the room where a chick is in a deep sleep, when a butterfly flies into the room from no where. Flaps of the butterfly awakens the chick. The chick begins to fly with the help of the butterfly. But before long, enemies are appearing with an attempt to make the chick fall into a sleep again.

name: Ninja Striker!
description: Ninja Striker! takes visuals and music inspired by the 8-bit era and fires them up with modern touches. Heavily stylised around Japanese themes, your goal is to advance forward with as much speed, flair and combo power as possible. You have double jumps, homing attacks and a special ‘Shinobi Action’ at your disposal; only by mastering each with sharp reflexes will you make it through your quest.

name: Raptainment
description:
Raptainment is an extensive simulation around the music business.
Manage your own rapper, develop the character and plan in detail the next big hit.
Release successful albums and play sold-out tours.

name: Kiitsu
description:
In this beautiful low-poly world, the water of your village has stopped flowing... endangering all your people !
You'll need bravery, intelligence and observation to solve each puzzle and bring water back to Kiitsu. But will you be up to the task ?

name: Unknown Pain: Hardcore
description: Hurricane shooter with an infinite number of enemies, dramatic story and black humor.

name: Tactical Chronicle
description: Prescribe tactics and lead your army to victory over the fearsome demon lord in this epic tactical adventure. Journey across a rich, expansive world and fight for valor and glory.

name: City Bus Simulator 2018
description: Experience passenger transportation across an impressive wide city in City Bus Simulator 2018, an indie simulation game. Drive a highly detailed and multi-functional bus model across the city within realistic traffic system. Transport passengers on the routes consist of more than 1000 bus tops and collect money from the passengers to unlock new longer routes. Different fares apply to different routes. Unlock new routes including night time ones!

name: Ladybird Reflect
description: Ladybird Reflect is a Breakout game about a ladybird on a journey to find its lost children and it needs your help to get them back.

name: Porcuball
description: Porcuball is a physics based puzzler where it's not about what you roll up, but how you use it.

name: Samba Shooter
description:
Minimal game.
Arcade style twin stick shooter.
Minimal price.

name: Space God
description:
Space God is a top-down shooting game that reinterprets retro sensibility.
You can experience singleplayer, co-op, and online multiplayer.
Never stop and keep moving! Then you will survive.

name: The Padre
description: You are THE Padre and have one job- to eliminate the weeds out of the garden of God. You are stuck in an infested demonic mansion, to do the shoveling with your guns, your faith, or even your bare hands. An unknown presence is watching, waiting to smash your armor of faith into dust. The Padre is a 3D Point-and-Click Survival Adventure that combines a deep and evocative narrative with slaughtering monsters and solving puzzles, delivered through various gloomy voxelized scenes in a Lovecraftian atmosphere.

name: Blasted Road Terror
description: Blasted Road Terror is real-time tactical looter in post apocalyptic setting. Command mighty warcrawler and manage squadron of vehicles in order to get unseen riches of the world and reach immortal glory. You will collect mighty arctifacts during your journey, enlarge your vehicle squadron so you can always pick right one for the job, rebuild your home base, make new friends and discover terrible enemies.

name: Healer's Quest
description: Healer's Quest is a lighthearted RPG in which you solely play as the healer of a band of jackasses.

name: Soot
description: Help Sooty rescue his girlfriend Molly from the evil vacuum! 50 levels of puzzles and perils.

name: Attack on Titan 2: A Titan Worth a Thousand
description: A new episode "A Titan Worth a Thousand" is added to the Daily Life section in "Story Mode", and to the "Scout Missions" in "Another Mode".

name: Attack on Titan 2: Skill Demonstration
description: A new episode "Skill Demonstration" is added to the Daily Life section in "Story Mode", and to the "Scout Missions" in "Another Mode".

name: Atelier Lydie & Suelle: The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings - Great Adventures in New Worlds Vol. 1
description: This bundle will add two new areas to the game: a Nights of Azure 2 tribute area "Nightless Ruined City" and the "Lotus Blossom Pond" area. *This content unlocks after the final chapter of the game. *This content is also included into "Atelier Lydie & Suelle Season Pass."

name: Attack on Titan 2: Second Victory
description: A new episode "Second Victory" is added to the Daily Life section in "Story Mode", and to the "Scout Missions" in "Another Mode".

name: Pinball FX3: Star Wars Pinball - The Last Jedi
description: It's time to play Star Wars Pinball: The Last Jedi! Revisit Luke Skywalker and Rey on Ahch-To Island, and help the Resistance survive the First Order. Relive movie scenes as unique pinball action on these two beautifully crafted pinball tables!

name: The Last Girl: Janna's Diary of Shame
description: The doom has come, facing all the dark sides of humanity and men who have become animal, alone. Can you survive?

name: Eqqo
description: Eqqo is a heartening tale of a mother, a blind child and an Egg - voiced and captioned in many languages. A multi-layered story full of symbols and metaphors about hope, love, nature and everything that connects us. It has four to five hours of exploration and puzzle solving in sacred lands and monumental temple rooms, as well as 25 hidden parchment scrolls to find and reveal new parts of the legend.

name: The Archivist: VR
description: The Archivist: VR takes you into the unpredictable dreamscape of Twin Peaks. Leaving the borders of reality behind, you will enter the meticulously recreated world in virtual reality and experience an unprecedented level of immersion as you re-live some of the show’s most iconic moments. With an original story line, set against the supernatural mythos of television's most mysterious town, 'The Archivist: VR' will bring you closer to the show than ever before.

name: Timun Mas and Green Giants
description:
In ancient times, there lived a green giant named Buto Ijo. He gives the cucumber seed to an elderly grandmother. Until one day, the cucumber seed grew into a giant cucumber. When the cucumber was split, inside was a cute little baby figure. The baby was also named Timun Mas. 8 years later, the green giant returns to take Timun Mas as his meal. 
 
You play as Timun Mas. Armed with four magic weapons, you are given the task of defeating the green giant. What are the weapons? His weapons are cucumber seeds, salt, shrimp, and also needles. Collect all these weapons to attack the green giant.

name: 13 Letters: Deluxe Edition
description: Welcome to 13 Letters, every choice you make will impact your personal story!

name: The Legend of Faty
description:
"The Legend of Faty is a cartoon-style and open world game. 
 
After the War of the Devil, the world has entered a period of peace. It's said that the world will be changed soon by someone, but no one knows how it will change. 
 
You are going to be the one who will change the world. It's almost impossible to achieve victory by yourself. You need to invite neutral beings to be your allies. They will give you great help. But, they will also share a lot of your money and experience."

name: Dragooned
description: Dragooned is a single player pick-up-and-play action game with 40 playable characters that have very different playstyles and a variety of modes, including advancing through procedurally generated levels with a party of characters, facing down endless onslaughts of enemies and undertaking a ...

name: Head Ball 2
description: Use Super Powers, improve your characters and be a football legend!

name: Party Trivia
description: Jam packed with over 6,000 multiple choice trivia questions in four genre categories, no game will be the same.

name: Yakuza 6: The Song of Life - Launch Edition
description:
Step into Japan's criminal underworld in this explosive action brawler starring legendary yakuza, Kazuma Kiryu, who is hellbent on unraveling the truth around his daughter's tragic accident.

The Launch Edition of Yakuza 6: The Song of Life includes the game + the Hardcover Art Book Package.

name: Yakuza 6: The Song of Life - Digital Deluxe
description: The Digital Deluxe edition was a bundle on PSN that also included Yakuza 6: The Song of Life Locations Theme and Yakuza 0.

name: Yakuza 6: The Song of Life - After Hours Premium Edition
description:
Step into Japan's criminal underworld in this explosive action brawler starring legendary yakuza, Kazuma Kiryu, who is hellbent on unraveling the truth around his daughter's tragic accident.

The After Hours Premium Edition includes:
- The game
- Art Book
- Two bar glasses
- Ice stones
- Tojo clan branded coasters
- Collector's Edition box

name: Mortal Squad: Portal to Hell
description: Control a squad of fearless soldiers with unique abilities to stop a mad scientist who is ready to open a portal for creatures from hell. A classical turn-based system and procedural generation of levels which would require various tactical decisions to beat the game.

name: Try to seize me
description:
Play with your friends. 
Cops and robbers work to take each other out. 
The game is focused around playing with friends. 
Robbers use traps to take out cops while cops use their trusty baton!

name: Batter Burst
description:
This game is a scroll action of continuous explosion drawn with pixel art.
Let's blow it all away.

name: Dark Ghost RPG
description: Together with the old prisoner, go on a hard and big trip to find the legendary land where there is no plague and darkness

name: Roller Coaster Apocalypse VR
description:
Three roller coasters with a Interactive Roller Coaster for VR - Virtual Reality 
-Apocalypse Destruction At this ride you feel inside the apocalypse 
-Apocalypse Shoot the Asteroids ride at apocalyptic environment 
-Before Apocalypse Here you can enjoy a slow ride with no loops at a sunny day.

name: Dr. Pills
description: Here is a brand new puzzle game in which you need to gather up pills of the same color to destroy all the harmful bacteria.

name: Techwars Deathmatch
description: Techwars Deathmatch is a top-down mmo action game with battle mechs. The game has an advanced system for destroying mechs and buildings. Pick a side and destroy the enemy in Siberia, Kazakhstan, Sochi and Alaska!

name: Game of The Forgotten Gods. Wake Up
description: The game of forgotten gods. Wake up is a dynamic action game, sword fighting, magic tricks, and an exciting adventure deep into the mysteries of the world, which are protected by invisible force.

name: Kolb Antarctica Experience
description: Using VR to deliver Experiential Learning. The main objective is to further facilitate the Department of Education curriculum learning through emerging technology that students are excited to use.

name: Baptize Billy
description: Baptize Billy is an arcade style shoot'em up that'll leave your anus busted and your mind disgusted.

name: Strategic Command Classic: WWII
description: The Matrix version is the Gold Edition of the Original Strategic Command: Blitzkrieg and Weapons and Warfare combined. It also contains the Pacific Theatre and Patton Drives East DLCs

name: Casey Powell Lacrosse 18
description:
Casey Powell Lacrosse 18 offers sports fans a dynamic, fast, and challenging experience, with all the excitement, speed, and scoring of real-life lacrosse, including a completely reworked series of faceoff, shot, stick and dodging controls. It also features enhanced AI that responds to the complex 6v6 tactics of lacrosse. New motion capture animations for everything from faceoffs and shooting to post-goal celebrations add even further realism to the game.

New to Casey Powell Lacrosse 18 is the ability to create custom stadiums and logos for your team. On top of that, Lacrosse 18 features comprehensive player and team creators, allowing you to put yourself and your team right into the thick of the biggest competitions of all.

name: Legend of Long Night
description: Legend of Long Night hearkens back to the golden age of online real-time strategy games. The game features current popular game trend and adds a survival mode.

name: Havoc in heaven
description:
"Havoc in heaven" is a defense strategy game with the theme of the novel Journey to the west. Reference plot and diverse characters in the classic journey to the west to show you a offbeat style game, experience the most innovative tower defense game VR novel together. 
"Naotiangong" character design cute and funny, cool special effects. More fun and fairy sisters waiting for your call!

name: Crazy Science: Long Run
description: No time to explain - grab your gun and run! Play as a mad genuis assistant and learn from bitter experience how hard is to be a side-kick of main characters in books, movies and shows of such genre.

name: Hero Academy 2
description: Sequel to the original tactical strategy game, Hero Academy 2 adds card collection, deck building, and real-time matches!

name: Guard of Wonderland VR
description: Guard of Wonderland is an interactive visual novel in virtual reality created from our inspirations of Alice in Wonderland.

name: Cross Pixels
description: Cross Pixels is a collection of Picross puzzles. Train your logic thinking and reveal the hidden picture.

name: Tempest Citadel
description: Assume the role of an enigmatic Captain from Terra as he embarks on a mission to explore a deadly world that promises wondrous and terrible power. Tempest Citadel is a strategy game set on a storm-ruled planet. Build a mighty Citadel in the clouds and lead your crew into battle.

name: Eternal Slumber Party II
description: Eternal Slumber Party II (often shortened to ESP2) is a megawad for Doom II created by TimeOfDeath and released on April 16, 2018. Just like its predecessor, Eternal Slumber Party, it is a collection of maps that TimeOfDeath had previously released as standalone PWADs, or as submissions to larger community projects.

name: Dungeon of Zaar: Explorer Edition
description: Unlock plenty of amazing content for Dungeon of Zaar!

name: Jetpack Joyride India Exclusive
description: Jetpack Joyride India Exclusive is a re-imagination of Jetpack Joyride, developed for indian market by Mech Mocha, in partnership with Halfbrick Studios. The original international game has been removed from indian stores, and replaced with the exclusive india version. The game ended it's support in early 2019, with the original version returning to the Indian stores later that year.

name: Kyoutou Kotoba RPG: Kotodaman
description: Sin descripción

name: Mystery Trackers: Mist Over Blackhill
description:
Elephant Games, creators of Halloween Stories, Grim Tales, and Chimeras, invites you to track down the truth behind another thrilling supernatural mystery!

For a seasoned Mystery Trackers detective, even a relaxing bike ride can quickly become a case! Passing through the town of Blackhill, you notice something is terribly wrong - the residents have gone into hiding, and an army of shadow monsters roams the streets! The activity seems to originate from the home of a local scientist who was conducting secretive experiments… but getting there will be dangerous. And what you discover when you arrive just might change the world as you know it! Can you uncover what happened before the darkness spreads? Find out in this thrilling Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

name: Lucky Penguin
description:
What a fortunate penguin, he finds four-leaf clovers all the time! Guide this lucky penguin through 40 stages of puzzle action, and feed his appetite for clover destruction. Brought to the NES & Famicom, proudly, in cooperation with Marcelo Barbosa & Lukasz Kur.

- 40 Challenging Mazes
- Enhanced Graphics through Flick-o-Vision
- Charming Penguin Protagonist

name: El Interrogatorio
description: A new case has come to the police station. A man has appeared in shock, stammering inconsistencies about his friend's disappearance. You must question him and discover what is true in what counts.

name: Minecraft Master Collection
description: Create anything you can imagine. Explore the mighty mountains and living oceans of infinite worlds, expanded further by free game updates, amazing community-made maps, servers, thrilling minigames and more! Survive online with friends on console, mobile, and Windows 10, or share the adventure at home in split-screen multiplayer.

name: Last Anime Boy 2: Hentai Zombie Hell
description: In 2088, Nazi Muslims achieved great success in the field of chemical weapons and, not to fall into captivity and fight even after death with the infidels, they created a serum that turned them into zombies.

name: Table of Tales: The Crooked Crown
description: Table of Tales: The Crooked Crown for PS VR is an RPG that brings a magical table to life before your very eyes! The Table grants you the power to guide a party of Scoundrels through the dangerous and intriguing realm of the Crown Islands!

name: Super Hero VR
description: Attacking enemies, using all kinds of skills to save human beings. such as Laser, magic ,gun, missile ,curse, bomb, bow .Be a HERO. You can move freely using HTC Vive (if you have enough space) and teleport yourself. Huge battle scenes, advanced game level design.

name: Infinite Vector
description: As a "Time Traveling Assassin" you are tasked with going back in time to take out the bad guys who ruined the future as we know it. You wield powers such as super speed, teleportation, and the ability to use anything in your environment to your advantage, including incoming bullets!

name: Age of Giants
description: Age of Giants Collectible Tower Defense game that challenges veteran players!

name: Rosette and Words
description: Rosette and Words is a crossword game puzzle where you must find words in a board full of letter tiles. Collect beautiful rosettes and make new ones!

name: Retro Runner: Endless Runner Adventure
description:
Roll down through a Virtual Paradise while avoiding obstacles and getting your best groove on.

The year was 1985! When the entire world was busy playing arcade games, there was this tiny shiny ball just sitting quietly in the corner. More of a technical glitch one lazy programmer left in the arcade.

Little did he know he had more powers than than a plumber trying to rescue his prices. He could overpower all the arcade heroes. One day, tired of being just a glitch and a joke.. it broke out of the code cage and went on rampage destroying the entire arcade station. He kept running with an amazing speed across the globe and upgraded his powers. In no time this rebellious ball took over the entire arcade genre.

Legend says its still running in our cables finding its life purpose. A true hero. Showing the world that awesomeness can be round and shiny!

Join a ball travel through an 80's city as he tries to collect coins and power ups while avoiding obstacles. Journey through endless city streets and fight through waves of flying obstacles.

name: What Are You Stupid
description: 'What Are You Stupid' is an unconventional quiz game that will pit players against people closest to him; his family and friends. Travel from house to house and throw-down a challenge to whatever household member resides within. Earn their respect by proving yourself to be an ample 'quiz warrior'.

name: Pivross
description:
Picross in 3D!

Play the classic Japanese puzzle game, also known as Nonogram or Hanjie, now on your PC and in three dimensions. Use logic to deduce which blocks you can destroy and which you need to keep to complete the model. 100 puzzles (20 for free) and hours of play!

name: Pong Like
description: In Pong Like, the player will use the mouse to manipulate the "circle" on the right side of the interface to move the bricks.

name: Oscillatron: Alien Frequency
description: Oscillatron: Alien Frequency - music arcade in space! You have to control the spaceship and destroy the alien troops, and music will be your weapon!

name: Caveman Stories
description: In Caveman Stories you control a caveman who, at the beginning of an ice age, got lost from his tribe and now must fight to survive and find a way back home. Face large and powerful enemies, survive the frosty nights by building shelters and try to unravel the plot behind the extreme cold.

name: Biotix: Phage Genesis HD
description: Immerse yourself in an epic war for survival.

name: Cubicorner
description: Cubicorner is an easy to handle puzzle game with a minimalistic environment and relaxing music.

name: Musical Reflex
description:
Musical Reflex is a game as its name suggests where you can test your musical reflex by having fun or trying to improve yourself and try to be the best in the ladder.
The principle of the game is pretty simple, press the right keys at the right time all this enbiencer with a music chooses.
Please consider this game is early so there may be some bugs and it does not have a lot of content. Other music, game mode and customization are planned for later. If you have tips for improving the game you are welcome to share them.

name: Slay.one
description: Shooting game

name: Dungeon of Zaar
description:
Dungeon of Zaar is a turn-based strategy game taking place in an ancient and magical castle where Explorers fight for treasures! For PC/MAC/Linux at launch.

Dungeon of Zaar is inspired by classic tactical games such as Final Fantasy Tactics, Advance Wars and by great strategy games such as Warhammer, Pokémon and Magic the Gathering. Nevertheless, the game is different from your standard tactical-RPG, we want it to be focused only on strategic decisions and have a huge emphasis on combat.

Players will create their own Dungeon Explorer and take part in intense battles in the Dungeon either on single player mode or PvP online or local hot seat mode with their friends around one computer.

Explorers don't come alone into the Dungeon. They are the brains, but not the brawn! They are escorted by a squad of Mercenaries recruited from around the Kingdom to protect them and help them forge onward.

name: Comfort Zone
description: spaces that exist for the sake of existing

name: Warship World War
description: This is a large multiplayer military naval battle simulation game. By using the hundreds of battleships that really existed during the Second World War, the player experienced the most authentic and exciting fun of naval battles. Online PvP battles. Prove your commanding skills in fierce naval battles with players from all over the world.

name: Felix VR
description: "Felix VR" is a VR story based on the series "Félix" by Movistar +. It is a nightmare of our protagonist where, while she is kidnapedd, regrets every lie she told Félix. Those lies haunt her, remaining etched to her skin, like tattos...

name: House of 1000 Doors: Evil Inside
description:
Use the power of light to defeat a devastating darkness before it destroys mankind!
Locate cleverly hidden objects, solve cunning puzzles, and complete challenging mini-games as you cleanse everything the infection has touched.

name: Blade and Wings: Future Fantasy 3D Anime MMORPG Game
description:
The new version featuring Epic pet - Maid has been released! Pay attention to the upcoming events to get the adorable pet! 
 
Blade & Wings is a 3D anime online action role-playing game that rated as a promising mobile MMORPG, which brings high quality graphics with a captivating story line and features a variety of challenging quests. To be distinguished from the crowded realistic style action RPG games, Blade & Wings brings a bright and fresh anime. 
 
For too long, players have become accustomed to battling against just NPCs in traditional games. Blade & Wings uniquely impact this primal setting and reverses the identity between NPC and player. In Blade & Wings, you become one of the NPC forces who break their seal and people surrounding you are the players and furious enemies. Join this epic anime game and show your enemies no mercy as you fire them out of this chaos then build a new future with order.

name: Dragon Super: Saiyan Ball Z
description: An unofficial Dragon Ball Z fighting game for Android.

name: Supermarket VR
description:
With this games you can go shopping! 
You will feel for the first time what future purchases will be like from your home or workplace. 
You will have to buy the products from a shopping list, with money and a limited time. 
And you will also have to avoid colliding with the other people who are buying.

name: Princess Boo - 3D Runner
description:
Princess Boo - 3D Run is a beautiful free 3D endless runner game for girls and boys which is a simple yet challenging game designed to hook your interest from the get go. 
 
Test your reflexes as you run, jump and slide through the kingdom with Princess Boo (dress and all) dodging crazy obstacles to escape the Wicked Witch. 
 
Be careful to avoid obstacles on this thrilling adventure. Swipe left and right to avoid obstacles, swipe up to jump and swipe down to slide. See how many stars you can gather and how far you can run with Princess Boo. Earn coins to unlock Princess Boo’s Princess friends. Earn coins by watching videos to unlock some of Princess Boo’s princess friends to help her on her quest to escape the witch. 
 
Some of Princess Boo’s besties include Leah, Laura and Abbie. When you become a pro, you are free to choose which princess will save the day and defeat the witch. 
 
Can YOU outrun the witch?? Give it a try today.

name: Rune Stones Quest 2
description: Years of war have certainly left marks on the once booming country of the dwarves. There is nothing left but ruins, poverty is ruling people’s lives. But now that the war is over, the dwarves embark on a hopeful mission: they want to rebuild the ancient city and bring it back to its former glory! Get ready for a marvelous Match-3 adventure and help them to craft the protective rune stones!

name: Mussoumano: Ataque dos Haters
description: Mussoumano: Attack of the Haters is a platformer adventure game inspired in the classics of the 90s with 3D graphics and featured by the Brazilian rapper and youtuber Mussoumano. In the game, an "evil hater" has stolen Mussoumano's 1 million subscribers YouTube award - the Golden Play Button.

name: Horror Fish Simulator
description: Most epic fishing simulator with minor horror theme

name: X-Town 3D game
description: 3-dimensional shooting game.

name: Draw Near
description: Huge meteorites suddenly collided with your space ship. Due to that shock, your ship is drifting in outer space now. Let's take various actions and survive in the lonely universe! Can you finally return to the earth? Your survival life begins now.

name: Voyage Senki VR
description: Sailing in the blue ocean and exploring a new world is a dream in people's nature. Voyage Senki VR is a game of sailing, exploring and adventure. Start a great expedition and Create a new land with your genius and talent of construction, manufacture, and protection. With VR device, you may sense a great achievement created by yourself with very newly experience in game. Choose a way freely in many different options in game with RPG, SLG, MOBA elements. Building a invincible country with your friends in a new blue legend continent

name: Rooky Moves
description: You are the kingdom's new rookie rook recruit. Determined, you decide to depart on an adventure to establish your honor. Are you skilled enough to slide through the pesky pawns, precarious pitfalls, and perplexing puzzles in your path?

name: rOt 2
description: Minimal puzzle game which goal is to get The Ball to the WinBox using the Circles in the scenes. Old and new obstacles, and the return of One Chance Mode.

name: Aentity
description: Aentity challenges you as an artist. Leaving my mind behind, the contours of the ego blur. Past the dream wall are no rules to break, there are playful moves to make, veiled visions to wake, unseen pictures to take.

name: Circles of Hell
description: Circles of hell - a cooperative platformer for lovers of complexities.

name: Beat the Art Breaker
description: A game with 4 endings. Your game will not be saved.

name: Ather
description:
Ather is a Psychological Indie Horror Game By LazyMonks Entertainment, You Play As Felix a youtuber and a haunted explorer who recieves an email about a haunted cabin in the woods. As soon as he enters the woods he finds something weird about this place. 
 
Ather is not just another game about Jumpscares and Scary ambiences but is backed by a powerful story. it is designed using real world terrain and high quality graphics. The game will attempt to make you feel many kinds of horrors, including those of phobias, the feeling of being watched, of being chased. it is a strange intermixing of reality and night terrors... 
 
You will have to figure out ways to overcome obstacles and also venture into the deepest darkness in order to advance, it emphasizes puzzle-solving and evasive action, rather than violence.

name: One Ping Only
description: A subdued adventure game that will take the player to unseen depths utilizing a unique and novel approach to vision and clarity.

name: Sonic Beyond the Speed
description:
Enjoy this fangame in 2d at full speed and platform.
Eggman plans to attack with his air fleet and so that sonic and tails do not bother them he will teleport along with the Chaos Emeralds to places of the past.

name: Metroid: Rechoose
description: A boss rush hack for Metroid: Zero Mission with three different paths you can take after each boss.

name: Plutonium T6 Multiplayer
description: A modded client for Call of Duty: Black Ops II's multiplayer mode that adds dedicated server support, anti-cheat, expanded controller features, custom map support, and other quality of life additions.

name: Virtual Gym Fighting
description: Step into 'Gym Heroes: Fighting Game,' where the worlds of boxing, karate, kung fu, and wrestling collide in dynamic one-on-one battles. Begin your journey as a novice, learning the ropes of boxing and karate. Then, advance to master the intense moves of kung fu and wrestling. As you conquer each fight, your skills in these fighting games will grow, making you a formidable force in the gym arena.

name: VirtualCast
description: Free yourself from physicality, stream as whoever you desire to be. VirtualCast is the VR live communication service that will turn your desire into reality.

name: Stick Match 2
description: Stick Match 2 is a silly game about a stick on an adventure.

name: Rhythm Jungle
description: Rhythm Jungle is a fun and adorable rhythm simulation game. The bear's daily life in the jungle has been developed into nine chapters. The game will let the player overcome the challenges in each chapter from a brand-new perspective.

name: Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle - Episode 12: Jurassic Jason
description: Help legendary horror icon Jason Voorhees stalk and slay campers across 100+ puzzle levels in a hilariously off kilter puzzle game. From the campgrounds of Crystal Lake to the highrises of Manhattan, from supermax prisons to space stations, Jason will terrorize victims across the world... and beyond!

name: Phi
description: Phi is a meditative action adventure game. The player controls Phi, a snake, navigating through a dark, lonely world in search of lost souls to bring to their final resting place. The game places strong emphasis on the movement of Phi.

name: Hello Squidward. Sponge Bob's Neighbor 3D
description: Hello Squidward. Sponge Bob's Neighbor 3D is a game about Sponge Bob who meet his Neighbor Squidward in his sponge neighborhood! You want to find out information and secrets of your neighbor whose name is Squidward!

name: Hiveswap Friendsim
description: A darkly comedic episodic visual novel set in the Homestuck/Hiveswap universe.

name: Glory of the Self- Styled Diehard girl
description:
Kaoru aim to be a manly man. But incidentally, he became a woman, which is the type all guys dream!
Kaoru Felt so discouraged for what happened.
But he tasted the joy of being a woman under the guidance of his friends gradually.
To see how Kaoru accept himself slowly…...

name: Sleepwalker
description: Lee is having a restless night - sure he's fast asleep, but that won't stop him taking one of his nocturnal journeys! Fortunately, our sleepwalker has a courageous canine companion who will try his utmost to protect his master from coming to any harm; Lee's faithful mutt, Ralph.

name: Broken Ties
description:
King Kalavant wishes to eradicate all races other than humans. You have been forced to flee from your home, and must seek out others to help you stop the eradication of the world at the hands of The New Order. 
In your journey you will travel across Viscordia, meet interesting allies, and perhaps even find romance when your journey comes to an end.

name: Loader
description: Loader is an exciting puzzle game where you place loads on platforms to pass levels.

name: Spaghet
description: Very few can resist the temptation of a warm plate of Spaghet... nor can you. You settle down, ready to sink your hands into that stringy goodness, but there's a problem: That's not your Spaghet. This isn't even your house, and the current residents don't appreciate having their food slapped around.

name: Ather: Chapter 1
description: Peccator is not just another game about jumpscares and scary ambiences, but it is designed with powerful story and graphics to challenge the player's psych.

name: OniBushi VR
description:
Samurai Action Slasher for VR
Defend your Castle from invaders using your fencing, ninja, archery skill.

name: Time Tenshi Paradox: Episode 2
description: A mysterious visitor makes her appearance... but what is the enigmatic threat lurking in the shadows? Join Rose, Kyo, Tessa and Michelle in the second episode of Time Tenshi Paradox, an episodic visual novel series from Silver Cow Studio!

name: Rabbit: Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Rabbit: Jigsaw Puzzles. Is a clever and colorful learning experience. Puzzles are a challenging young minds, teaching and preparing them early in life some very important life skills.

name: The Abbattoir Intergrade
description:
Welcome to The Abbattoir Intergrade. The year is 2238, and you are assuming the role of Shepherd Cartalia of the colony X1407, a human colony on the habitable planet B382 founded in 2148. Earth is 20 light years away and has largely been abandoned after the climate became erratic, quickly alternating between extreme high and low temperatures.  
 
At the start of your expedition your colony was outfitted with the latest terraforming package provided by the Human Federation. This package includes an AI module that modifies livestock DNA to generate edible lifeforms that area ideal to the planet conditions allowing you to focus efforts on terraforming and construction. Your settlement progress has been spectacular, and although you're nearing retirement, you've managed to expand the colony from its meager initial size of 100 adult citizens in a valley, to over 1,000 residents of all ages spread over several outposts during your tenure. 
 
Unfortunately, the 'Sustenance and Nutrient Generator' you were given seems to be malfunctioning, as the animals being created have recently exhibited violent behaviour and are now chasing down your people as they flee to the founding settlement. You need to set up defenses to slow the tide of violent animals, while you begin a search for a lasting solution. 
 
This game is a unique fusion of tower defense strategy and visual novel, with branching dialogue and four different endings. As you play, the AI uses machine learning to discover what offense is the best against specific defenses. It takes into account the pathing, water hazards, and even the genetics of the animals which it controls indirectly by selecting the best specimens from its own evolving evaluation.

name: Autocross Madness
description:
Time to tour the world!
Drive trough beautiful landscapes and go mad into curves or just be a Sunday driver.
Challenge yourself in driving like a mad man as you try to get to the finish line as fast as possible.

name: Pirates: All Aboard!
description: The sea is calling...pick a ship, bring friends and sail on!

name: Who's in the Box?
description: What can be so strange about a simple wooden box? You've found one in your garage, and it has nothing out of the common. Except for the fact that there is someone in it, and they need your things for some reason.

name: Nicky: The Home Alone Golf Ball
description:
A poor and home alone golf ball needs your help to get your goal - to find his home ( a hole in a golf track ) in less movements as possible.
Nicky moves only with mouse, you just need to drag, look at some point and release.
The game is funny and challenging!

name: V-Racer Hoverbike
description: V-RACER HOVERBIKE is a fast-paced futuristic racing game in VR. Coming soon to SteamVR for HTC VIVE and OCULUS RIFT.

name: Germination
description: An astronaut has crash-landed on an alien planet, and it's started to rain... seeds. Featuring a campaign and an endless mode with leaderboards, Germination is an arcade platform-em-up about stomping your way to the highest combo, excruciatingly detailed with hand-crafted animations.

name: Achievement Clicker 2019
description: Feel like a real Achievement hunter! Earn Achievements, upgrades and get the most Achievements on Steam!

name: TurbOT Racing
description:
TurbOT Racing is an underground robot race competition sponsored by a big corporation.
In the role of an Advanced AI your goal is to drive a powerful robotic system in races that will both challenge your response time and perception of the environment.

name: Reboant - Endless Dawn
description:
Reboant - Endless Dawn, with its huge worldview under Sci-fi backgrounds, cinematic graphics through all game levels, creative gameplay based on VR hardware features, full arm IK performance generated from advanced technologies, targets to be a pioneer product in VR game industry.
Your thrilling experience is much more convincible and impressive than any words. Come to join us!

name: Desert of Vice
description: A narrative based horror text adventure game with choice dependent multiple endings.

name: ARK -the lost fairytale-
description: An exploration game made with 'RPG Maker'. Different from other exploration games where you solve puzzles through 'logical reasoning', these puzzles are based mainly on fairytales. Help the little girl find her favourite rabbit doll and discover the secrets of the mansion!

name: Achievement Idler Black
description: Achievement Idler: Black is an Achievement spam "game" that you start up to idle in the background and get the achievements.

name: Hykee: Episode 1 - Underwater
description:
Locked in the Captain's cabin, a storm has damaged your boat.
You have to find all of the clues and escape before drowning.

name: Ashley: The Story Of Survival
description: Her life was changed in a few seconds… She has lost everything - parents, home, childhood… Now she has to survive in this world.

name: Gal Gunvolt Burst
description: Take on brand-new 2D side-scrolling action with a 'Burst Combo!' Enter a virtual world of cyber-landscapes and unravel the mystery behind its creation!

name: Solas and the White Winter
description:
"Unlock the tomb and break the cycle.." Solas and the White Winter takes place in a hostile and mysterious land. You play as Solas; a young but determined girl who finds herself locked in a desperate situation.

You must travel to each of the temples of this land to break the seal of the tomb, and bring about an end to the relentless winter.

name: Eredia: The Diary of Heroes
description: Hunt or be hunted in a vast open world scarred by the tides of war. Eredia: The Diary of Heroes is an open world, turn based JRPG that introduces innovative new concepts and features while retaining the nostalgic elements of old school JRPG Games.

name: Infecto
description:
A mad scientist created a deadly virus.
Mankind is on the verge of extinction.
People turn into zombie mutants.

name: Dimension of Monster Girls
description: Morgan, a young man going on a trip to visit his parents, ends up nearly drowning when his ship sinks. When he awakens, he finds himself in a world ruled by monster girls and three of them want him to be their husband! He has only five days to get to know them and choose a girl to be with.

name: Archery Blast
description: Archer ... to your bow! In Archery Blast you are an aspiring archer taking on even more crazy challenges! This time there are 60 challenges waiting for you!

name: RoboHeist VR
description: RoboHeist is an intensive and immersive Virtual Reality stealth game specially designed for HTC Vive VR device. Your mission is to find and power up the teleport on each level. Watch out for evil robots, lasers and alarms. Hide in closets and chests, climb ladders, crawl and crouch. Sneak around in shadows and use weapons to destroy the robots.

name: Twilight on Yulestead
description: Break the curse on your town and yourself with only your cleric's staff and being half your normal size.

name: March to Glory
description: March to Glory is a turn-based strategy game that takes you through the Napoleonic wars with a new strategic and challenging gameplay, full of interesting mechanics combined with thrilling combat.

name: Revival of the Road
description: The first Russian game project with a real city - Astrakhan . Always dreamed of going to their native places right in the game? To run, to jump - to drive, to drive? Well .. Welcome! - You have an exact copy of the city!

name: Co-op SNEK Online
description: Eat dots, get long, don't die. Enjoy classic SNEK gameplay spread over many stages with your friends both online and locally.

name: Marie's Room
description: Marie's Room is a short-story exploration game about an unconventional friendship between two classmates, told through memories. You play as Kelsey, remembering Marie's room as it was 20 years ago. What happened to Marie and Kelsey all those years ago?

name: Quanect
description: The game has two realities, and in order to pass the level, you must move between them. Reality is not identical, objects and their position in different variations of the same room is different. You have to find a way out using these differences.

name: Idle Adventure
description: Idle Adventure is a text-based, multi-player online RPG game. Even without astonishing graphics or special effects, it can offer you countless hours of enjoyment.

name: Don't Sink
description: Capture islands, sink ships, defend your towns, and discover an exciting world full of adventure.

name: Central Intelligence
description: Central Intelligence is the ultimate test of your strategic skills. In this CIA style mission you can operate in three areas, Propaganda, Military, and Political, to achieve your objectives.

name: Amberskull
description: Amberskull is a survival horror game.

name: Dead In Vinland
description: Dead In Vinland is a survival/management game with RPG and adventure elements. Exiled on an unknow island, lead Eirik and his family to their survival. Manage their physical and mental health, explore the island, organize your camp, deal with other human beings, discover esoteric mysteries...

name: Infantry
description: Drop down on Damocles, the war ridden alien planet, and fight to the death in our action packed shooter Infantry. Infantry puts you right into the action, giving you a multitude of classes, weapons, game modes and customization to wage war against your enemies in an online multiplayer environment.

name: The King of Fighters XIV: Najd
description: Najd wears the Abaya (traditional Saudi garment) which has extraordinary powers, but remains humble. She lives a double life, a college student during the day, but at night, she turns into a vigilante to protect her fellow citizens from evil.

name: The King of Fighters XIV: Blue Mary
description: This additional character ‘BLUE MARY' is available in 'THE KING OF FIGHTERS XIV' with this purchase.

name: The King of Fighters XIV: Heidern
description: Heidern commands the mercenary unit where Ralf and Clark belong. He fights using a combination of martial arts and self-taught assassination techniques. As a military officer, Heidern remains calm and silent, but can be over protective to his adopted daughter Leona.

name: The King of Fighters XIV: Oswald
description: This additional character ‘OSWALD’ is available in 'THE KING OF FIGHTERS XIV' with this purchase

name: Soundless Mound
description: Soundless Mound is a single-level PK7 for Doom II using the GZDoom source port. It was designed by Marisa Lago in 2018 and is inspired by the Silent Hill series of survival horror games. In the Doom Mapping Contest II: Hellectric Boogaloo, it was awarded first place, and it received further updates via the author's GitHub repository.

name: Senran Kagura Burst Re:Newal - Kagura, Naraku & Ryouki Set
description:
This Downloadable Content Contains:
3 new playable characters (Kagura, Naraku, Ryouki) and new outfits

name: Gênio Quiz Poke 2
description: Gênio Quiz Poke 2 is a sequel to Genius Quiz Poke, with 50 new questions themed around the Pokémon franchise.

name: Atlas Reactor: Necrolancer Freelancer Six Pack
description: Unlock six of Atlas' most fearsome freelancers, then unleash true darkness with 8 sinister skins.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - New Species 2018
description: When the reserves initially opened, 12 animal species were huntable between Layton Lake District and Hirschfelden Hunting Reserve, and an additional 4 in Medved-Taiga National Park and 7 in Vurhonga Savanna (paid DLC content). The ecosystems of these reserves are ever-changing, sometimes leading to the emergence of new species…

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Weapon Pack 1
description: The wardens Connie, Doc and Alena have received a shipment with brand new weapons - the Virant .22LR Semi-Automatic Rifle, the Crosspoint CB-165 and the Houyi Recurve Bow.

name: Regions of Ruin: Sieges
description:
Do you want more Regions of Ruin? Did you feel you wanted to add Siege mechanics to the game? New characters, companions, and loot? Then this is your DLC!

Introducing the Regions of Ruin Sieges DLC which includes :
- 7 New siege event areas
- 2 New mercenary types for hire
- New building (Training Ground)
- Loads'o'loot
- Greatly upgrade companions
- Repeatedly challenge yourself with sieges to earn unending loot and rewards
- Hire new companions to help in the fray and from afar

name: Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle - Episode 8: Future Shock
description: Help legendary horror icon Jason Voorhees stalk and slay campers across 100+ puzzle levels in a hilariously off kilter puzzle game. From the campgrounds of Crystal Lake to the highrises of Manhattan, from supermax prisons to space stations, Jason will terrorize victims across the world... and beyond!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Boeing Vertol CH-46 Sea Knight
description: The Boeing Vertol CH-46 Sea Knight is a medium-lift tandem rotor transport helicopter powered by twin turboshaft aircraft engines.

name: Zombie's Retreat
description: Zombie's Retreat is an action RPG involving a young man and his camping retreat. What's intended to be a bonding experience turns horribly wrong when a sudden evil outbreak spreads across the camp. With very 'strange' circumstances surrounding this new found threat, it is up to the player to save any and all survivors while attempting to escape in one piece!

name: Phobos Vector Prime: The First Ring
description:
Discover the origin of the Renegade faction with its leader, J.L. Brown, in the first single player campaign of Phobos Vector Prime, the frenzied third-person shooter arcade!

Year 2490. Space expansion has started. Humanity has the necessary technology to explore the Solar System for the first time and the galaxy has become a battlefield. Everyone wants their share of the stars. Space pilot J.L. Brown hates this war, but he decides to enroll for the money and remain hidden until he is required. However, J.L.'s sleep is altered by a mysterious explosion. After regaining control of his damaged ship, the pilot sets out to discover what is happening, but the TFR will not make it easy...

name: FX-Unit Yuki: The Henshin Engine
description: Take control of Yuki and set of on a digital journey of pixel proportions! Get Ready for FX-Unit Yuki!!! 8 levels of hardcore retro action with Power-Ups, Varying Stage Types and Multiple Endings accompanied by an Amazing Sound Design.

name: ACA Neo Geo: Gururin
description: Gururin is an action-puzzle game released in 1994 by FACE. Enjoy a puzzle game the likes of which you've never seen before while rotating the Magic Troupe "Gururin"! Comes with One Player Mode, Challenge Mode (VS CPU), and Two Player Mode.

name: Battleship: Official Edition
description: You sank my battleship! The official version of the classic Hasbro board game of naval combat! Challenge other players in Classic Mode or in the all-new Commanders Mode - a fast-paced, strategic and exciting variation.

name: Cross Country Skiing VR
description: Cross Country Skiing VR is a virtual, cross country skiing race where your task is to cross the finish line before your opponent. But watch out! Your ski poles are very short so be ready to squat down get moving with your arms to have a fair chance at the win!

name: Silverworld
description: In a world of trackless jungles, colossal beasts, and cruel pre-human civilizations, you must survive the past if you want to save the future! Face the savage inhabitants of Silverworld and build your own civilization—or plunder the past and return home unimaginably rich!

name: Chineze
description: Chineze is the HSK (Chinese Proficiency Test) quiz trainer, with the aim to improve your Chinese vocabulary. You'll have an opportunity to choose exact level of HSK. Every HSK level has a number of categories for easier learning process.

name: Zig
description: 50 levels of fast-paced, old school, arcade blasting.

name: ADR-Labelling Game
description: ADR-Labelling teaches the players the basics of markings dangerous goods transport vehicles. Players can either place the markings on pre-made cargo or load the vehicles themselves. Once the cargo has been selected player is tasked to place all the correct orange plates and ADR labels on the vehicle. Game is designed to give additional support and an interactive training platform for people studying for their ADR license.

name: Dungeons of the dead
description: Dungeons of the dead ... Who knows what is hidden in them?

name: Time Skip
description: A fast-paced first person puzzle experience. Teleport, create platforms and lasers to reach the next level.

name: Natural Landscape: Grand Canyon
description: The Natural landscape series is a virtual tourism VR game based on unreal engine developed meticulously by Magicvalley Studio. The Grand Canyon Colorado is the third episode of this series.

name: Overchunked
description: "Overchunked is a game about a giant circular saw constantly moving forward: steer it left and right to guide its course, dodge obstacles, TNT explosives and destroy the rest of the environment to obtain points!"

name: Hearthstone: The Witchwood
description: Hush, brave heroes, and take heed; you tread on dangerous ground. See how the light dims all around, and moving shadows creep? The Witchwood calls, but I implore: do not its treasures seek! Stay where it’s safe, pull up a chair, let’s play another round! I see, your minds are quite made up; please hear me importune: Keep your decks close, and your wits sharp…

name: Logic Mahjong Souryu: Yon-nin Uchi / San-nin Uchi
description: Sin descripción

name: The Road to Hades
description: TRTH (The road to hades) is a horror adventure game full of Asian myths and art. Guide the girl safely in the world of the dead. Welcome to a new game you have not experienced.
